name: com.ripandy.soar
description: Scriptable Object Architecture Reactive-extensible with R3

samples.description: Demonstrates how to encapsulate logic in Command objects.
Demonstrates how to use GameEvents for decoupled communication.
Demonstrates how to use Variables to share and observe data.
Demonstrates how to use reactive Collections to drive UI.
Demonstrates the request-response pattern with Transactions.
Shows how to use the UnityEventBinder to wire events in the Inspector.
Demonstrates how to save and load data using Jsonable assets.
